Title: Cinderella
Writer: Oscar Hammerstein II (book), Robert L. Freedman (teleplay)
Actors: Brandy Norwood, Bernadette Peters, Veanne Cox, Natalie Desselle Reid
Plot: Although mistreated by her cruel stepmother and stepsisters, Cinderella is able to attend the royal ball through the help of a fairy godmother.
Awards: Won 1 Primetime Emmy. Another 2 wins & 22 nominations.
